00:59:08,808 --> 00:59:11,436
Now, that is a fucking murder.

729
00:59:12,187 --> 00:59:15,440
- What's he doing?
- OK. H-He stalks her.

730
00:59:15,482 --> 00:59:18,360
And, uh...

731
00:59:18,401 --> 00:59:20,820
he rapes her... and he does her.

732
00:59:20,862 --> 00:59:24,199
And records it, right?
He wants to see it again and again.

733
00:59:24,241 --> 00:59:27,410
He records himself
raping and killing.

734
00:59:27,452 --> 00:59:30,580
- While sending a signal to her.
- So she feels what he feels

735
00:59:30,622 --> 00:59:32,707
while he's inside her.

736
00:59:32,749 --> 00:59:37,671
The thrill while he's killing her
is sent to her, heightening her fear,

737
00:59:37,712 --> 00:59:41,383
which, in turn,
heightens the turn-on for him.

738
00:59:42,968 --> 00:59:45,095
I've seen... I've seen a lot.

739
00:59:45,136 --> 00:59:47,556
- So have I. Too much.
- It's a bad one.

740
00:59:51,142 --> 00:59:55,105
He makes her see her own death,
feeds off the reaction.

741
00:59:55,146 --> 00:59:57,774
He records it all. Everything.

742
00:59:57,816 --> 01:00:01,653
- And gives it to you.
- Yeah. He wants to share it.

743
01:00:01,695 --> 01:00:04,906
Of course he wants to share, man.
That's his deal.

744
01:00:04,948 --> 01:00:07,784
He needs an audience.
This is a sick puppy.

745
01:00:07,826 --> 01:00:11,121
- Why me?
- Cos you're the magic man, Lenny.

746
01:00:11,162 --> 01:00:13,248
You make dreams happen.

747
01:00:13,290 --> 01:00:17,419
If it's got something to do with
the wire, it washes up on your beach.

748
01:00:17,460 --> 01:00:21,214
I've never dealt in black-jacks.
Never. Everybody knows that.

749
01:00:21,256 --> 01:00:25,510
He's just skull-fucking you, buddy.
He just wants a reaction out of you.

750
01:00:25,552 --> 01:00:29,055
He wants to make you do something
that you do not want to do.

751
01:00:29,097 --> 01:00:32,475
Maybe he figures Lenny will
appreciate what he's created.

752
01:00:32,517 --> 01:00:35,604
It's the dark end of the street.
How do you like it now?

753
01:00:35,645 --> 01:00:40,650
- Jesus, Mace, back off.
- This guy's one of your squid-heads.

754
01:00:40,692 --> 01:00:44,154
- He's somebody you know, Lenny.
- The problem with that is

755
01:00:44,196 --> 01:00:46,656
Lenny knows... everybody.

756
01:00:46,698 --> 01:00:49,618

- No.

757
01:00:50,660 --> 01:00:53,413
No. I'll... They'll crucify me.

758
01:00:53,455 --> 01:00:58,460
So this wire-freak
gets to keep running around, huh?

759

The police will think he's the perp.

760
01:01:00,670 --> 01:01:03,798
They'll go through his client list,
and ruin his life...

761

such as it is.

762

I'll call my buddies at homicide,
say Iris was my friend.

763
01:01:09,763 --> 01:01:13,892
That'll put me in the loop. I'll get

764
01:01:13,934 --> 01:01:18,897
Get some sleep. I'll call you
when I get something. Relax!

765
01:01:21,233 --> 01:01:23,276
Lenny!

766
01:01:23,318 --> 01:01:26,404
Keep moving, man.
Somebody's thinking about you a lot.

767
01:02:03,775 --> 01:02:05,527
Leave me alone!

768
01:02:07,070 --> 01:02:10,156
Don't come to my house.
Are you trying to ruin my life?

769
01:02:10,198 --> 01:02:13,118
Iris is dead. She was murdered.

770
01:02:17,289 --> 01:02:20,208
- Who did it?
- Whoever he is, he's damaged goods.

771
01:02:20,250 --> 01:02:22,544
Iris said you were in danger, too.

772
01:02:22,586 --> 01:02:25,505
- I'm not in any danger.
- Faith! No more games.

773
01:02:25,547 --> 01:02:30,218
Whatever you're hiding you have
to get out of here. Come with me now!

774
01:02:30,260 --> 01:02:33,513
Then what? Are you gonna protect me?
Are you a tough guy?

775
01:02:33,555 --> 01:02:36,808
You're a fucking talker.
You don't even own a gun.

776
01:02:36,850 --> 01:02:39,060
I have a gun under my bed.

777
01:02:43,857 --> 01:02:46,943
You don't know what you're
fucking with here.

778
01:02:46,985 --> 01:02:50,280
- Tell me.
- Tell him, Faith. Go on.

779
01:02:51,781 --> 01:02:56,161
Uh, listen. Lenny just stopped by
to give me some bad news, OK?

780
01:02:56,203 --> 01:02:59,831
An old friend of mine's
been murdered. Remember Iris?

781
01:02:59,873 --> 01:03:02,000
How the fuck did you get up here?

782
01:03:02,042 --> 01:03:03,543
Charm.

783

Tell you what, Lenny.
Just for you, hmm?

784

Make you a deal.
Why don't you just take her? Hm?

785
01:03:11,343 --> 01:03:14,804
If she's so unhappy and she wants
to leave, she can go!

786
01:03:14,846 --> 01:03:19,267
Besides, Faith always knows
what she wants. Don't you, baby?

787
01:03:19,309 --> 01:03:22,020
See? Hands off.

788
01:03:24,356 --> 01:03:28,818
I'll tell you something else.
I'll tell you this, you fuck.

789
01:03:28,860 --> 01:03:31,863
If she says she stays, you go.

790
01:03:31,905 --> 01:03:34,950
You crawl back to wherever
the fuck it is you came from

791
01:03:34,991 --> 01:03:37,077
and never cross my vision again.

792
01:03:41,665 --> 01:03:43,124
Faith...

793
01:03:45,043 --> 01:03:46,920
Come on.

794
01:03:52,342 --> 01:03:54,427
Come on...

795
01:04:01,768 --> 01:04:04,020
I've made my choice, Lenny.

796
01:04:09,985 --> 01:04:12,070
Get him out.

797
01:04:12,863 --> 01:04:14,948
Get him out!

798
01:04:14,990 --> 01:04:18,994
You're fucking crazy, Faith!
You're fucking crazy! Come with me!

799
01:04:19,035 --> 01:04:20,996
Faith!

800
01:04:24,249 --> 01:04:27,711
I don't love you anymore.
Do you understand that?

801
01:04:27,752 --> 01:04:33,216
You mean nothing to me!
Leave me alone, Lenny, please!

802
01:04:36,928 --> 01:04:40,849
You said you were gonna get Iris
out of this, Philo.

803
01:04:40,891 --> 01:04:43,184
Now you understand
the danger we're in.

804
01:04:43,226 --> 01:04:47,397
So sweet what you said out there,
so touching. I almost believed it.

805
01:04:47,439 --> 01:04:51,401
I don't think he even understands
you did it for him.

806
01:04:51,443 --> 01:04:54,154
He doesn't know what's going on.
Leave him alone!

807
01:04:54,196 --> 01:04:56,072
I'd love to leave him alone

808
01:04:56,114 --> 01:04:59,784
if he'd stop coming round
and you'd stop talking!

809
01:05:03,121 --> 01:05:06,374
The only time a whore should open
her mouth is when she's giving head.

810
01:05:14,132 --> 01:05:16,551
Shit! Mace! Help!

811
01:05:16,593 --> 01:05:19,846
Don't be shy, Lenny.
This is your floor.

812
01:05:19,888 --> 01:05:23,016
Come on now, Lenny.
You're going to the hospital.

813
01:05:23,058 --> 01:05:26,978
Can we be smart here?
I could make it worth your while.

814
01:05:27,020 --> 01:05:30,982
I don't mind a couple of shots.
Just go light is all I'm saying.

815
01:05:31,024 --> 01:05:33,109
Here, look. Take my Rolex.

816
01:05:34,236 --> 01:05:37,447
Ooh, nice watch.

817
01:05:37,489 --> 01:05:39,699
- Is this impact resistant?
- Sure.

818
01:05:41,284 --> 01:05:43,495
You stupid piece of shit!

819
01:05:43,537 --> 01:05:45,622
You stupid fuck. Get up!

820
01:05:45,664 --> 01:05:47,999
Come on. Get up!

821
01:05:52,128 --> 01:05:54,589
Oh, ho. Pain. Pain!

822
01:05:59,803 --> 01:06:03,181
We tried to find a smaller girl
to beat the shit out of you,

823
01:06:03,223 --> 01:06:05,267
but it was short notice.

824
01:06:05,308 --> 01:06:07,143
It was short notice!

825
01:06:07,185 --> 01:06:10,939
Oh! Ow! That one had to hurt.

826
01:06:26,830 --> 01:06:28,915
Safety's on.

827
01:06:46,683 --> 01:06:48,894
Come on. Let's go.

828
01:06:50,103 --> 01:06:51,980
Hey, wait!

829
01:06:59,237 --> 01:07:02,115
- I need a drink.
- Lenny, get some rest.

830
01:07:02,157 --> 01:07:04,701
The cops know they'll
never nail this guy

831

the second they walk in the room.

832
01:07:07,120 --> 01:07:09,581
It's all about
what they see walking in...

833
01:07:09,623 --> 01:07:12,500
dead hooker, handcuffs, penetration.

834
01:07:12,542 --> 01:07:17,005
Cops are lazy, and they know nobody
gives a shit about a dead hooker.

835
01:07:17,047 --> 01:07:19,132
They're roadkill, right?

836

So they'll take pictures, make jokes,

837

like it's a random kill.

838
01:07:24,930 --> 01:07:29,142
- It's the kind you never solve.
- That doesn't add, does it?

839
01:07:29,184 --> 01:07:32,729
Iris said she knew somebody
was after her. That is not random.

840
01:07:32,771 --> 01:07:35,357
If they get me, I...

841
01:07:35,398 --> 01:07:37,901
She said "they". "If THEY get me."

842
01:07:37,943 --> 01:07:41,947
Which means this whole random
sex killer thing is bullshit.

843
01:07:41,988 --> 01:07:46,076
- Somebody whacked her for a reason.
- So this guy's not a psycho?

844
01:07:46,117 --> 01:07:48,703
He's a psycho.
To do what's on that tape,

845
01:07:48,745 --> 01:07:51,289
he's not a well-adjusted human being.

846
01:07:52,040 --> 01:07:54,125
I got to get some sleep.

847
01:07:54,167 --> 01:07:58,964
OK, Lenny. Put that down,
and I'll check on you tomorrow.

848
01:07:59,005 --> 01:08:02,092
Hey, you wanna rub my neck?

849

My shoulder's real sore.

850

OK. All right. Come here.

851

- Right here?
- Yeah. Oh, yeah.

852
01:08:12,644 --> 01:08:14,312
Ohh...

853

Don't stop.

854
01:08:20,819 --> 01:08:23,321
How's Zander?

855
01:08:23,363 --> 01:08:25,448
Oh... He's fine.

856
01:08:27,534 --> 01:08:30,704
- I miss him.
- He misses you, too.

857
01:08:32,455 --> 01:08:35,917
I'm real sorry about being
so hard on you earlier.

858
01:08:35,959 --> 01:08:42,090
I just see you getting sucked into
this deeper and deeper, and, um...

859
01:08:42,132 --> 01:08:45,760
Macey, come on.
I know you still love me.

860
01:08:52,475 --> 01:08:55,520
How can you do this
in front of your child?

861
01:08:55,562 --> 01:08:57,647
In front of your son.

862
01:08:57,689 --> 01:09:00,650
- Mace, hold on. Mace...
- In front of your son!

863
01:09:03,737 --> 01:09:05,614
Zander!

864
01:09:07,115 --> 01:09:08,867
Zander!

865
01:09:08,909 --> 01:09:11,870
"When a child loves you
for a long, long time,

866
01:09:11,912 --> 01:09:15,123
"not just to play with,
but really loves you..."

867
01:09:15,165 --> 01:09:17,000
- Hi, honey.
- Hi, Mommy!

868
01:09:17,042 --> 01:09:19,920
- This is Lenny.
- Hi.

869
01:09:42,234 --> 01:09:45,695
'Hi, it's Lenny.
Just what do you have in mind?'

870
01:09:46,947 --> 01:09:50,700
'Hey, the last day of the world
and you spend it in bed?'

871
01:09:54,079 --> 01:09:56,414
- What's up, Max?
- Not a whole lot, man.

872
01:09:56,456 --> 01:09:59,292
They've just been saying
words over Jeriko.

873
01:09:59,334 --> 01:10:01,962
Tension's running
pretty high down here.

874
01:10:02,003 --> 01:10:03,547
- Faith OK?
- Yeah.

875
01:10:03,588 --> 01:10:06,258
She's leaving with Gant,
so I got to boogie.

876
01:10:06,299 --> 01:10:11,054
Iris checked into the Regent last
night under a false name. Paid cash.

877
01:10:11,096 --> 01:10:13,265
- So she was hiding out.
- Yep.

878
01:10:13,306 --> 01:10:16,226
I heard you dropped in
on Gant last night.

879
01:10:16,268 --> 01:10:20,146
- 'Another slick Lenny move, huh?'
- He's in this somehow.

880
01:10:20,188 --> 01:10:22,899
'Just stay close to Faith, OK?'

881
01:10:22,941 --> 01:10:24,985
No worries, bro. I gotta jam.

882
01:13:26,583 --> 01:13:28,668
What up, Lenny?

883
01:13:29,586 --> 01:13:31,671
- So, where we going?
- Anywhere.

884
01:13:31,713 --> 01:13:35,425
- You're acting strange, what's up?
- Shh, Mace.

885
01:13:35,467 --> 01:13:37,969
We'll talk about it in the car.

886
01:13:39,679 --> 01:13:41,556
Hand me that box of tapes.

887
01:13:54,069 --> 01:13:56,613
- Oh, shit.
- What's the matter?

888
01:13:56,655 --> 01:13:58,740
This tie doesn't go with blue.

889
01:14:06,665 --> 01:14:09,251
Lenny, would you relax?

890
01:14:09,292 --> 01:14:11,378
We're not being followed.

891
01:14:11,419 --> 01:14:15,674
- Stop being so paranoid.
- The guy had a knife to my throat

892
01:14:15,715 --> 01:14:16,925
in my living-room.

893
01:14:18,093 --> 01:14:21,012
Relaxing might be right out, OK?

894
01:14:43,577 --> 01:14:48,498
Oh, man. Oh, that is one
unbelievable piece of eye-fuck.

895
01:14:48,540 --> 01:14:52,335
Skip the art criticism, Tick. What
can you tell me about the wearer?

896
01:14:52,377 --> 01:14:54,838
That guy is fucked up.

897
01:14:54,880 --> 01:14:57,424
- We know that.
- He has some distortion

898
01:14:57,465 --> 01:14:59,342
in the visual cortex.

899
01:14:59,384 --> 01:15:03,471
The color and grey-scale values
are messed up, like color-blindness.

900
01:15:03,513 --> 01:15:07,893
See the peak period ratios? There
could be a tumor or brain lesion.

901
01:15:07,934 --> 01:15:11,938
Whoever's doing this is using a box
to split the signal...

902
01:15:11,980 --> 01:15:16,193
- Ever make a box like that?
- A few. I can't see if it's mine.

903
01:15:17,152 --> 01:15:19,237
I don't like this.

904
01:15:20,030 --> 01:15:22,490
- This is not good.
- What?

905
01:15:22,532 --> 01:15:25,619
It's cutting close to me.
She was just here, man!

906
01:15:25,660 --> 01:15:27,704
- Who?
- Iris!

907
01:15:27,746 --> 01:15:30,290
- Iris was here?
- She was shaking like a junkie,

908
01:15:30,332 --> 01:15:33,084
saying she wanted me
to copy some clip.

909
01:15:33,126 --> 01:15:35,545
- What clip?
- I don't know.

910
01:15:35,587 --> 01:15:39,007
She said I wouldn't wanna see it.
She was gonna give it to you.

911
01:15:39,049 --> 01:15:43,136
- She never gave me a tape.
- Think back to what she said.

912
01:15:43,178 --> 01:15:47,015
She came in. She was crying.
She wanted to go to my car.

913
01:15:47,057 --> 01:15:49,768
Let's go to your car.
There's something you have to see.

914
01:15:49,809 --> 01:15:50,852
- Something about my car.
- In your car.

915
01:16:06,159 --> 01:16:09,120
That's a handy little
attitude adjuster.

916
01:16:21,758 --> 01:16:23,969
Damn. I'm boxed in.

917
01:16:47,242 --> 01:16:50,537
- What's it say?
- Nothing.

918
01:16:50,579 --> 01:16:52,998
Let's go play this back.

919
01:16:57,294 --> 01:17:01,590
- Give us the tape right now.
- I'm just tryin' to get my car back.

920
01:17:01,631 --> 01:17:03,675
Shut the fuck up.

921
01:17:03,717 --> 01:17:06,887
- Give him the tape.
- It's in my case.

922
01:17:06,928 --> 01:17:09,764
I'm gonna open my case.

923
01:17:10,015 --> 01:17:12,559
Facing us, so we can see it.

924
01:17:24,988 --> 01:17:27,574
Take it and turn her loose, OK?

925
01:17:27,616 --> 01:17:29,701
Yeah. Absolutely.

926
01:17:56,937 --> 01:18:00,690
"Oh, no. No.
We're not being followed, Lenny."

927
01:18:00,732 --> 01:18:02,442
"Don't be paranoid."

928
01:18:34,474 --> 01:18:36,268
Shit!

929
01:18:36,309 --> 01:18:40,897
- The glass is bullet-resistant.
- Whatever happened to bulletproof?

930
01:18:42,649 --> 01:18:44,025
Shit!

931
01:18:44,067 --> 01:18:46,319
Calm down. This is what I do.

932
01:18:52,409 --> 01:18:54,494
Hang on!

933
01:19:21,688 --> 01:19:22,981
Christ.

934
01:19:52,969 --> 01:19:54,596
Shit!

935
01:19:58,475 --> 01:20:00,810
God damn it. 911 is busy.

936
01:20:00,852 --> 01:20:02,729
It's all right, Lenny.

937
01:20:02,771 --> 01:20:04,940
They'd never make it in time.

938
01:20:12,030 --> 01:20:15,742
It won't open!
Oh, you're crazy.

939
01:20:40,475 --> 01:20:41,518
Oh, God!

940
01:20:43,687 --> 01:20:46,857
- This is bad.
- The gas tank's gonna go any second.

941
01:20:53,321 --> 01:20:55,323
Hold on.

942
01:21:06,710 --> 01:21:09,170
Are you out of your fucking mind?

943
01:21:09,212 --> 01:21:11,840
The fire is out, isn't it?

944
01:21:17,304 --> 01:21:19,389
Get in here, Lenny.

945
01:21:19,431 --> 01:21:21,474
Come on! Move it! Move!

946
01:21:41,453 --> 01:21:43,872
Get ready to hold your breath.

947
01:21:43,914 --> 01:21:47,292
Just kick out hard
and follow me, OK?

948
01:22:01,890 --> 01:22:04,017
Let's get out of here.

949
01:22:17,531 --> 01:22:21,660
I can't believe you had to give
them the damn tape.

950
01:22:21,701 --> 01:22:23,912
Yeah. Me neither.

951
01:22:23,954 --> 01:22:26,081
It was one of my favorites.

952
01:22:26,122 --> 01:22:29,251
Me and Faith in the hot tub
on my birthday.

953
01:22:32,128 --> 01:22:34,214
Are we impressed yet?

954
01:22:34,256 --> 01:22:36,341
Yeah.

955
01:22:36,383 --> 01:22:38,468
Pretty impressed.

956
01:22:38,510 --> 01:22:41,680
# Here we kitty come, come,
here we kitty come, come... #

957
01:22:41,721 --> 01:22:45,684
Well, I'm missing the party of the
century, hauling your asses around...

958
01:22:45,725 --> 01:22:50,146
- Hey, Curtis. Just drive, all right?
- This shit is wack.

959
01:22:50,188 --> 01:22:53,316
- Those two guys were cops.
- You sure?

960
01:22:53,358 --> 01:22:57,529
It's the walk. Anyway, they'll get
your address. We got to keep moving.

961
01:22:59,614 --> 01:23:03,368
#... that crawls through the cracks,
you love that red, white... #

962
01:23:03,410 --> 01:23:06,246
What you doing all wet?

963
01:23:06,288 --> 01:23:09,833
What's up? Zander, we're going
to Aunt Cecile's house.

964
01:23:09,875 --> 01:23:12,836
